# Demonstration

```{r sparsity, echo = T}
# Set parameters
M <- 6
p <- 0.5
# Generate matrix (Erdos-Renyi)
P <- RM_erdos(M, p) 
# Get eigenvalues
eigen_df <- eigen_frame(P)
eigen_plot(P,mat_type = "Erdos-Renyi")
```

\newpage

# Various Parameter Values

```{r parameters}
M_vec <- c(3,5,10)
p_vec <- c(0.1,0.5,0.6)
c(M1,M2,M3) %<-% M_vec
c(p1,p2,p3) %<-% p_vec
P_vec1 <- matrix(c(RM_erdos(M1,p1),
                  RM_erdos(M1,p1),
                  RM_erdos(M1,p1)),
                nrow = M_vec[1])
P_vec2 <- matrix(c(RM_erdos(M2,p2),
                  RM_erdos(M2,p2),
                  RM_erdos(M2,p2)),
                nrow = M_vec[2])
P_vec3 <- matrix(c(RM_erdos(M3,p3),
                  RM_erdos(M3,p3),
                  RM_erdos(M3,p3)),
                nrow = M_vec[3])
```

\newpage 

## (M = 3, P = 0.1)

```{r, echo = FALSE}
eigen_plot(P_vec1[,1:M1 + 0*M1], "Erdos-Renyi")
```


## (M = 3, P = 0.5)

```{r, echo = FALSE}
eigen_plot(P_vec1[,1:M1 + 1*M1], "Erdos-Renyi")
```


## (M = 3, P = 0.9)

```{r, echo = FALSE}
eigen_plot(P_vec1[,1:M1 + 2*M1], "Erdos-Renyi")
```
